field.label: Author(s)
field.hint: Please include the full name of the author, including middle initial and year of birth, in the following format: Last, First M.I., YYYY--. For example: "Doe, John Q., 1985--". Year of birth is not required, but preferred.
field.required: You must enter at least one author for this item.

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the main title of the item.
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Other Titles
field.hint: If the item has any alternative titles, please enter them below.

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: Enter the name of the publisher of the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Date of Issue
field.hint: Please give the date of previous publication or public distribution below. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable.
field.required: You must enter at least the year.

field.label: Citation
field.hint: Enter the standard citation for the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Series/Report No.
field.hint: Enter the series and number assigned to this item by your community.

field.label: Identifiers
field.hint: If the item has any identification numbers or codes associated with it, please enter the types and the actual numbers or codes below.

field.label: Type
field.hint: Select the type(s) of content of the item. To select more than one value in the list, you may have to hold down the "CTRL" or "Shift" key.

field.label: Genre
field.hint: Select the genre(s) that cateogrize the item. To select more than one value in the list, you may have to hold down the "CTRL" or "Shift" key.
field.required: You must enter at least one genre.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the main content of the item. If the language does not appear in the list below, please select 'Other'. If the content does not really have a language (for example, if it is a dataset or an image) please select 'N/A'.

field.label: Subject Keywords
field.hint: Enter appropriate subject keywords or phrases below.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Enter the abstract of the item below.

field.label: Sponsors
field.hint: Enter the names of any sponsors and/or funding codes in the box below.

field.label: Description
field.hint: Enter any other description or comments in this box.

field.label: Author(s)
field.hint: Please include the full name of the author, including middle initial and year of birth, in the following format: Last, First M.I., YYYY--. For example: "Doe, John Q., 1985--". Year of birth is not required, but preferred.
field.required: You must enter at least one author for this item.

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the main title of the item.
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.hint: If the item has any alternative titles, please enter them below.

field.required: You must enter at least the year.

field.hint: Enter the standard citation for the previously issued instance of this item.

field.hint: Enter the series and number assigned to this item by your community.

field.label: Type
field.hint: Select the type(s) of content of the item. To select more than one value in the list, you may have to hold down the "CTRL" or "Shift" key.

field.label: Genre
field.hint: Select the genre(s) that cateogrize the item. To select more than one value in the list, you may have to hold down the "CTRL" or "Shift" key.
field.required: You must enter at least one genre.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the main content of the item. If the language does not appear in the list below, please select 'Other'. If the content does not really have a language (for example, if it is a dataset or an image) please select 'N/A'.

field.label: Subject Keywords
field.hint: Enter appropriate subject keywords or phrases below.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Enter the abstract of the item below.

field.label: Sponsors
field.hint: Enter the names of any sponsors and/or funding codes in the box below.

field.label: Description
field.hint: Enter any other description or comments in this box.

field.label: Author(s)
field.hint: Please include the full name of the author, including middle initial and year of birth, in the following format: Last, First M.I., YYYY--. For example: "Doe, John Q., 1985--". Year of birth is not required, but preferred.
field.required: You must enter at least one author for this item.

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the main title of the item.
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Other Titles
field.hint: If the item has any alternative titles, please enter them here.

field.label: Advisor
field.hint: Enter the name of the faculty advisor. If known, include the middle initial and year of birth.
field.required: The name of at least one faculty advisor is required.

field.label: Department
field.hint: Select the name of the department. If the department is not available, please select "Other."

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: For dissertations and theses, the publisher is always Northern Illinois University.

field.label: Submission Date
field.hint: Please give the submission date. You must enter at least the year.
field.required: You must enter at least the year.

field.label: Citation
field.hint: Enter the standard citation for the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Type
field.hint: Select the type(s) of content of the item. To select more than one value in the list, you may have to hold down the "CTRL" or "Shift" key.

field.label: Genre
field.hint: Select the genre(s) that cateogrize the item. To select more than one value in the list, you may have to hold down the "CTRL" or "Shift" key.
field.required: You must enter at least one genre.

field.label: Degree type
field.hint: Select the degree type.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the main content of the item. If the language does not appear in the list, please select 'Other'.

field.label: Rights
field.hint: This is the standard rights statement attached to every dissertation and thesis.

field.label: Subject Keywords
field.hint: Enter appropriate subject keywords or phrases.
field.required: At least one keyword is required.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Enter the abstract of the thesis.

field.label: Notes
field.hint: Enter any other description or comments in this box.

field.label: Extent
field.hint: Enter the number of pages, e.g. "23 pages"
